meanings.sent1: The painting hung wavelessly on the wall, undisturbed by the commotion.
meanings.sent2: The cat slept wavelessly on the windowsill, not even twitching its tail.
meanings.sent3: The book sat wavelessly on the shelf, waiting to be read.
